Package renderer.pipeline

Class NearClip_Triangle

java.lang.Object
renderer.pipeline.NearClip_Triangle
public class NearClip_Triangle extends Object
Clip in camera space any Triangle that that crosses the camera's near clipping plane z = -near. Interpolate Vertex color from any clipped off Vertex to the new Vertex.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static List<Primitive>
    clip(Model model, Triangle tri, Camera camera)
    If the Triangle crosses the camera's near plane, then return a clipped version that is contained in the far side of the near plane.

  • Method Details

    • clip

      public static List<Primitive> clip(Model model, Triangle tri, Camera camera)
      If the Triangle crosses the camera's near plane, then return a clipped version that is contained in the far side of the near plane. When a triangle gets clipped, the result can be either one or two new triangles. The new clipped Triangle objects are returned in a List object.

      Two new clipped Vertex objects may be added to the Model's vertex list and two new interpolated Color objects may be added to the model's color list.

      If the Triangle is completely on the camera side of the near plane, then return an empty List object to indicate that the Triangle should be discarded from the model's Primitive list.

      Parameters:
      model - Model that the Triangle tri comes from
      tri - Triangle to be clipped
      camera - Camera that determines the near clipping plane
      Returns:
      a clipped version of tri in a List object
